prompt: You are tasked with the job of a linguistic archaeologist. Dig through the words of the input sentences, extracting the first letter of each word and combining them to form a completely new word. This word must be valid in English, no gibberish or nonsensical formations. Your output should be the new word only, no spaces, special characters, or additional comments. Use your skill and creativity to handle each sentence uniquely and produce diverse results.
